item.title: terminology
item.description: rank: the number of dimensions in the output of a transformation or the number of dimensions in the columce space column space: the set of all possible outputs Av is the column space of A full rank: When the rank equals the number of columns null space/kernel: the space of all vectors that become null following a transformation
